name: Ex-pic-dition
description:
Welcome to Ex-Pic-Dition!

Ex-Pic-Dition is a simple, relaxing adventure in a vibrant world

Spend your time taking pictures of wonderful Creatures and Flora as you explore the uninhabited biomes of the Old Country. But, remember to keep an eye on the battery of your trusty Drone Camera – staying active in the camera for too long will cause it to drain and require you to return to basecamp.
